inbox.title: Recieved Messages
inbox.explanation: This page lists messages that you have recieved from other empires. Clicking on a messages opens the details view modal with the full text. You can delete multiple messages at once by using the checboxes on the left.

outbox.title: Sent Messages
outbox.explanation: This page lists messages that you have sent to other empires. Clicking on a messages opens the details view modal with the full text. You can delete multiple messages at once by using the checboxes on the left.

sysbox.title: System notifications
sysbox.explanation: This page lists system notifications that you have recieved. Clicking on a messages opens the details view modal with the full text. You can delete multiple messages at once by using the checboxes on the left.

recipient.label: Recipient ticker
recipient.cancel: Click to clear selection and ticker.

massDelete.title: Really delete message?|Really delete messages?
massDelete.explanation: Do you really want to delete one message? The message will be irrecoverably lost.|Do you really want to delete {num} messages? The messages will be irrecoverably lost.

report.title: Report Message
report.explanation: When you report this message it will be brought to attention to Imperium Stellarum's staff. If there are violations of our terms of use we will take appropriate actions.
report.abuse: Do not abuse this feature - spamming reports for ingame enemies will have consequences.
